title: Oral Health Probiotic | Dental Probiotics for Teeth & Gums | Fresh Breath, Cavity Prevention & Immune Support | BLIS K12 & M18 Strains - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Oral Health Probiotic - Complete Dental Wellness Support

Transform your oral health with our Oral Health Probiotic, a specialized formula featuring clinically-studied probiotic strains that support healthy teeth, gums, and fresh breath. Unlike traditional oral care that only addresses surface issues, our probiotics work to balance your oral microbiome for long-lasting dental wellness.

Key Benefits

  • Promotes Fresh Breath: Beneficial bacteria crowd out odor-causing microbes for lasting freshness
  • Supports Healthy Gums: Reduces harmful bacteria that contribute to gum inflammation and disease
  • Cavity Prevention: Helps maintain healthy pH balance to protect tooth enamel
  • Oral Immune Support: Strengthens natural defenses in the mouth and throat
  • Reduces Plaque Formation: Beneficial bacteria help prevent harmful biofilm buildup
  • Ear, Nose & Throat Health: Supports upper respiratory wellness

Clinically-Studied Probiotic Strains

  • BLIS K12 (Streptococcus salivarius): Clinically proven to support oral and throat health, fresh breath, and immune function
  • BLIS M18 (Streptococcus salivarius): Supports healthy teeth and gums by producing enzymes that target harmful bacteria
  • Lactobacillus reuteri: Reduces inflammation and supports gum health
  • Lactobacillus paracasei: Supports oral cavity health and immune function

How Oral Probiotics Work

Your mouth contains billions of bacteria - both good and bad. When harmful bacteria dominate, it can lead to bad breath, cavities, gum disease, and other oral health issues. Oral probiotics introduce beneficial bacteria that:

  • Crowd out harmful bacteria
  • Produce natural antimicrobial compounds
  • Support healthy pH balance
  • Strengthen oral immune defenses
  • Reduce inflammation

Perfect For

  • Chronic bad breath (halitosis)
  • Gum sensitivity or inflammation
  • Frequent cavities
  • Dry mouth
  • Post-dental procedure support
  • Overall oral health maintenance

Suggested Use: Take 1-2 capsules daily. For best results, let dissolve in mouth or chew before swallowing.

Quality Assurance: Contains clinically-studied probiotic strains. Shelf-stable formula.
shortDescriptionHtml: Support dental wellness with Oral Health Probiotic. Clinically-studied BLIS K12 & M18 strains promote fresh breath, healthy gums, cavity prevention, and oral immune support. Balance your oral microbiome naturally. 60 capsules.
suggestedUse: Take 1-2 capsules daily. For best results, let dissolve in mouth or chew before swallowing.
